TopicTitle: For that launch which goes awry...

Articles.Content:
Next time you've got a launch that goes awry, I've found the perfect soundtrack for it...

If you didn't laugh, there's something wrong with you.

If you didn't laugh, there's something wrong with you.

I did laugh but my Google Fu tells me that the video you posted is wrongly attributed to a children's performance. It seems that the recording was actually done tongue-in-cheek by the Portsmouth Sinfonia. I'd be happy to be proven wrong though.

I did laugh but my Google Fu tells me that the video you posted is wrongly attributed to a children's performance. It seems that the recording was actually done tongue-in-cheek by the Portsmouth Sinfonia. I'd be happy to be proven wrong though.

Nope, you're right. This was actually an experiment done by them, they switched out everyone's instruments so people were playing with something they had never played before.

I did laugh but my Google Fu tells me that the video you posted is wrongly attributed to a children's performance. It seems that the recording was actually done tongue-in-cheek by the Portsmouth Sinfonia. I'd be happy to be proven wrong though.

It's just something passed on to me from a friend. Wherever it came from, I laughed so hard I almost pee'd my pants.
